meanings.sent1: The immanency connection between the two ideas was clear.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being immanent.
meanings.sent1: The immanency of the music filled the room with emotion.
meanings.sent2: His immanency in the project was evident from the start.
meanings.sent3: The immanency of the situation made everyone laugh at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The immanency of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The immanency of the problem required immediate attention.
